name: Nidoqueen

attacks.name: Mommy Mode
attacks.effect: Search your deck for 2 basic Pokemon with Nido in their names. Put them on your Bench. You may attach an Energy to one of them. Either way, shuffle your deck afterwards.

attacks.name: Motherly Rage
attacks.effect: Deal 10 more damage for each card that has Nido in its name in your discard.

flavor: The worst thing you can do to a Nido is take away their family. That's what you did to Nidoqueen.
